about_the_game:
Arctic Wolves is an open-world action game that blends the charm of wolves with dynamic combat set in a snowy, fantasy-inspired world. As a player, you’ll explore this winter landscape, meet various characters, and uncover their unique traits. Completing quests for these characters earns you currency, which you can use to buy weapons, apartments, and vehicles.

With a wide variety of locations to explore, you can roam the terrain on foot, soar in a helicopter, drive an ATV, or even command a tank.

Customization is central to Arctic Wolves, giving you the ability to control your character’s appearance entirely, down to specific details. You can also design custom NPCs who can join you on your journeys.

For those interested, the game includes optional NSFW content, featuring explicit character customization and interactive sex scenes.

Building out your personal spaces is also part of the experience; you can purchase furniture and decor to create your ideal apartment and upgrade your properties.

Arctic Wolves invites players to create, explore, and battle in a unique world, where the freedom to customize and discover makes each adventure your own.

content_descriptors.notes:
Arctic Wolves contains mature content intended for adults. Players will encounter scenes of violence, a variety of weapons, including assault rifles and rocket launchers, blood (optional toggle), dead bodies, and strong language.

The game also offers customizable adult content:
Players can fully personalize character appearances, with options to adjust detailed physical attributes and choose explicit clothing and features. There is also a option to spawn NPCs with these specific attributes.

Characters can engage in sexual interactions, with a variety of positions and scene settings, available in first-person POV (only for the player) or with an adjustable camera.  Sexual interactions can be initiated at any location in the game through character dialogue, or with beds and jacuzzis as specific interaction points. Adult-themed locations, such as a pub or a private house including BDSM props and sex toys can be found in the world. These props can also be accessed via the build-mode.

All sexual adult content is optional and requires player activation in the settings.
